name: Běncǎo Shàn Shí Lù
summary: This is a casual healing game that blends herbal cultivation, recipe preparation, and garden construction. After an unexpected fire, you are expelled from your master's school and wandered to the south of the Yangtze River. Through cooking healthy food, planting herbs, and decorating your garden, you heal the diners' bodies and minds, experience the artistic conception of Chinese gardens, gradually uncover the stories behind lost recipes, and realize the true meaning of the world through flavor and human kindness.
